snippet.title: KILLSQUAD - Ekaar - Hero Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the game here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/910490 

A new Hero is joining Killsquad: Ekaar! 

Ekaar is coming to the battlefield with his combat drones, each with a special ability such as shields, slowdowns, and targeted damage. Combined, they give you more tactic control of the fight to finish his enemies with a hell blast of his shotgun.

Welcome to Killsquad: a co-op action game that blends twin-stick shooter, hack and slash, and drops in a dash of character customization & progression. Join us on a journey to five planets full to the brim with enemies for you to annihilate. Choose your hero, select your skills, weapons, gears, talismans, and unleash hell through waves of relentless enemies and fearsome bosses.

KILLSQUAD is built on Unreal Engine to reach indie AAA production values. 

Please support us: 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/killsquadgame
Discord: https://discord.gg/killsquad
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/novarama_official/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pg/Killsquad-2214554828614147
